org.hibernate.tool.schema.internal

Class SchemaDropperImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hibernate.tool.schema.internal.SchemaDropperImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SchemaDropper

    public class SchemaDropperImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements SchemaDropper
    This is functionally nothing more than the creation script from the older SchemaExport class (plus some additional stuff in the script).
